Headline: Budapest's most glamorous spas
Article_Body: The Spa at the Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace: This luxury spa at the renowned Gresham Palace houses a sauna, a whirlpool, a relaxation pool and Vichy shower treatment rooms. Zafir Spa at the Párisi Udvar Hotel: One of the most charming boutique spas around, the Zafir Spa is a great place to unwind after a busy day in Budapest. The Royal Spa at the Corinthia Hotel: With a 15-meter galleried swimming pool and an array of relaxation rooms, The Royal Spa is undoubtedly one of the most luxurious spas in the city. The Ritz-Carlton Spa: This lavish retreat is comprised of a fitness center, a spa and wellness area. Kempinski The Spa: Based in downtown Budapest at the Kempinski Hotel Corvinus, Kempinski The Spa   is one of the most highly rated spas in Budapest. Bridge Spa at Sofitel Budapest Chain Bridge: Positioned on the banks of the River Danube, this spa holds a heated indoor swimming pool and state-of-the-art gym equipment. New York Palace Spa: Guests can relax at the spa's intriguingly designed pool area, which looks a bit like a cave. SPA InterContinental: This Budapest spa provides guests with a luxurious pampering experience with access to a heated indoor pool, a steam cabin and a sauna.
